app_metadata.description: Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution directly from your mobile phone.
app_metadata.name: immich

run_as_context.description: Immich runs as any non-root user.
Redis runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: Immich

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Immich

attrs.label: Enable Machine Learning
attrs.description: Enable Machine Learning

attrs.label: Machine Learning Image Type
attrs.description: The type of image to use for Machine Learning.

enum.description: Default Machine Learning Image
Cuda Machine Learning Image
Rocm Machine Learning Image
Openvino Machine Learning Image

attrs.label: Database Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the database.

attrs.label: Redis Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the redis.

attrs.label: Log Level
attrs.description: The log level to use for Machine Learning.

enum.description: Verbose
Debug
Log
Warn
Error

attrs.label: Hugging Face Endpoint (Optional)
attrs.description: The Hugging Face endpoint to use for Machine Learning.

attrs.label: Database Storage Type
attrs.description:
Recommended type is SSD.</br>
If you encounter a issue with the database while using HDD</br>
please remember to mention that when opening an issue.

enum.description: SSD
HDD

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Immich files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Immich files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for Immich WebUI

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Use Old Storage Configuration (Deprecated)
attrs.description:
Use the old storage configuration.</br>
This is deprecated and will be removed in the future.</br>
Please use the new storage configuration instead.

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions
attrs.description:
Automatically set permissions for the host path.
Enabling this, will check the top level directory,</br>
If it finds incorrect permissions, it will `chown` the
host path to the user and group required for the
postgres container.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

Immich

Immich - Self-hosted backup solution for photos and videos on mobile device
